AI_SEARCH_URL: Replace with your AI Search URI Example - https://your-resource-name.search.windows.net
AI_SEARCH_KEY: Replace with your AI Search API Key
AOI_DEPLOYMODEL: Replace with your Azure Open AI Deployment model
AOI_ENDPOINT: Replace with your Azure Open AI Enpoint. Example - https://your-resource-name.openai.azure.com/
AOI_API_KEY: Replace with your Azure OpenAI API Key
